text: Deborah Leah Birx (born April 4, 1956) is an American physician and diplomat. She was the United States Global AIDS Coordinator for Presidents Barack Obama and Donald Trump from 2014 to 2021. She was best known as the Coronavirus Response Coordinator for the White House Coronavirus Task Force during the COVID-19 pandemic in the United States for Trump's presidency. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States Category:American physicians Category:Politicians from Pennsylvania Category:Scientists from Pennsylvania
title: Deborah Birx
